question: List the movies that have been released in more than 5 countries.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE size(m.countries) > 5
RETURN m.title, m.countries
error: No size/length function equivalent in TypeQL

question: What are the top 5 movies by number of languages spoken in them?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.languages IS NOT NULL
RETURN m.title, size(m.languages) AS languageCount
ORDER BY languageCount DESC
LIMIT 5
error: No size/length function equivalent in TypeQL

question: Find all users who have rated movies from more than three different genres.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:RATED]->(m:Movie)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre)
WITH u, count(DISTINCT g) AS num_genres
WHERE num_genres > 3
RETURN u
error: Cannot filter on aggregation result (num_genres > 3)

question: What are the top 3 movies with the most countries listed in their release?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.countries IS NOT NULL
RETURN m.title, m.countries
ORDER BY size(m.countries) DESC
LIMIT 3
error: No size/length function equivalent in TypeQL

question: What are the top 5 movies with the highest IMDb rating that have been directed by the same director?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[:DIRECTED]-(d:Director)
WITH d, m
ORDER BY m.imdbRating DESC
WITH d, collect(m)[0..5] AS topMovies
RETURN d.name AS director, [movie IN topMovies | movie.title] AS movies, [movie IN topMovies | movie.imdbRating] AS ratings
error: Complex subquery with list operations not supported

error: Schema does not include WON relation or Award entity

question: Find all movies where the director has directed more than 5 movies.
cypher:
MATCH (d:Director)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)
WITH d, count(m) AS num_directed
WHERE num_directed > 5
MATCH (d)-[:DIRECTED]->(movie:Movie)
RETURN d.name AS director, collect(movie.title) AS movies
error: Cannot filter on aggregation result (num_directed > 5)

question: What are the top 3 movies with the highest number of countries involved in their production?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.countries IS NOT NULL
RETURN m.title, m.countries, size(m.countries) AS numCountries
ORDER BY numCountries DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Which movies have a revenue to budget ratio greater than 2? Limit to 5 movies.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.revenue IS NOT NULL AND m.budget IS NOT NULL AND m.revenue / m.budget > 2
RETURN m.title, m.revenue, m.budget, m.revenue / m.budget AS ratio
ORDER BY ratio DESC
LIMIT 5
error: Arithmetic expressions (division) not supported in TypeQL

question: List the first 3 users who rated a movie on its release day.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[r:RATED]->(m:Movie)
WHERE m.released = date(datetime({epochSeconds: r.timestamp}))
RETURN u.name AS user, m.title AS movie, m.released AS releaseDate
ORDER BY r.timestamp
LIMIT 3
error: Datetime arithmetic with epoch conversion not supported

question: List the first 3 movies that have been directed by more than one director.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE exists{ (m)<-[:DIRECTED]-(:Director) }
WITH m
MATCH (m)<-[:DIRECTED]-(d:Director)
WITH m, count(d) AS directorCount
WHERE directorCount > 1
RETURN m.title AS movie
LIMIT 3
error: Cannot filter on aggregation result (directorCount > 1)

question: Which 5 movies have the highest average user rating? Limit to movies rated by at least 10 users.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[r:RATED]-(u:User)
WITH m, avg(r.rating) AS avgRating, count(r) AS numRatings
WHERE numRatings >= 10
RETURN m.title AS movie, avgRating
ORDER BY avgRating DESC
LIMIT 5
error: Cannot filter on aggregation result (numRatings >= 10)

question: Which 5 directors have directed movies in more than 5 different languages?
cypher:
MATCH (d:Director)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)
WITH d, size(collect(distinct m.languages)) AS num_languages
WHERE num_languages > 5
RETURN d.name, num_languages
ORDER BY num_languages DESC
LIMIT 5

question: What are the top 5 movies with the smallest gap between release and rating date?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[r:RATED]-(u:User)
WITH m, r, u, datetime(m.released) AS releasedDate, datetime({epochSeconds: r.timestamp}) AS ratingDate
WITH m, duration.between(releasedDate, ratingDate).days AS daysBetween
ORDER BY daysBetween
LIMIT 5
RETURN m.title AS movie, daysBetween AS daysBetweenReleaseAndRating
error: Datetime arithmetic with duration not supported

question: List the first 3 movies with the most different directors involved.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)

LIMIT 3

question: What are the top 5 movies with the most user ratings received in their first year of release?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[r:RATED]-(u:User)
WHERE datetime(m.released).year = datetime(r.timestamp).year
WITH m, count(r) AS ratingCount
ORDER BY ratingCount DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN m.title AS movie, ratingCount AS ratingsInFirstYear
error: Datetime year extraction and comparison not supported

question: Identify movies that have been rated 10 times or more with a rating above 8.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.imdbRating > 8
  AND exists {
    MATCH (m)<-[r:RATED]-()
    WITH m, count(r) AS numRatings
    WHERE numRatings >= 10
  }
RETURN m
error: Cannot filter on aggregation result (numRatings >= 10)

question: Which 3 directors died after 2000 and directed more than two movies?

WHERE d.died > date('2000-01-01')

WHERE num_movies > 2
RETURN d.name AS director, d.died AS died, num_movies
ORDER BY num_movies DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Which 3 actors have acted in both a highest and lowest grossing movie?
cypher:
MATCH (a:Actor)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)
WITH a, m
ORDER BY m.revenue DESC
WITH a, collect(m)[0] AS highestGrossingMovie, collect(m)[-1] AS lowestGrossingMovie
WHERE exists{ (a)-[:ACTED_IN]->(highestGrossingMovie) } 
  AND exists{ (a)-[:ACTED_IN]->(lowestGrossingMovie) }
RETURN a.name AS actor, highestGrossingMovie.title AS highestGrossingMovie, lowestGrossingMovie.title AS lowestGrossingMovie
LIMIT 3
error: Complex list indexing and intermediate aggregation not supported
